name: react-go
description: A template that generates a Vite React Typescript with TailwindCSS and Axios for the frontend and a Go server with static file and APIs server a Gin router. It includes a Makefile to build locally and to build a container.

name: react-openai
description: A template that generates a Vite React Typescript project with TailwindCSS, React Router, and Axios for the frontend deployable as static assets.

name: react-go-openai
description: A template that generates a Vite React Typescript with TailwindCSS, and Axios for the frontend to process OpenAI prompts and completions.
